page.discussion: The A5_STYLESHEET_ENUM() function returns a list of form styles.
page.example: ? a5_stylesheet_enum() = Alpha Five Default Alpha Five Drop Shadows Alpha Five Stamped Metal Alphasports Alphasports V10 Avant Garden Blue Concrete Blue Contrast Blue Corporate Blue Glass Canvas Dark Modern Dropdownlookup Earth Tones Gray Lines Green Green Contrast Hazy Blue Herringbone Khaki Light Modern Marble Mediterranean Money Olive Springs Osx Pin Stripes Plastic Powderpuff Pumpkin Red Contrast Red Paper Rose Spotty Blue Square But Hip Subtle Glass System Water White
